rows.label: tev026901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Meg if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev026901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Meg if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Me? Well, I'm a pastry chef by trade.
I do all the cakes for Zalia Café.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0002
rows.name:
But at the moment, I'm helping Ni Zain out with his
curry shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0003
rows.name:
I mean, he's a great cook and all, but when it comes
to waiting tables or doing the books or pretty much
anything else...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0004
rows.name: Well, let's just say he's a lost cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0005
rows.name:
So that's why I stepped in. Cooking has been so good
for him—I wouldn't want him to go out of business
and wind up on the streets, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0008
rows.name:
You know Enrai over in the industrial district?
You'd never guess it, but he's got an insatiable
sweet tooth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0009
rows.name:
He used to buy a slice of cake every time he dropped
by the bake shop—although these days he just orders
a tea to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0010
rows.name: Something must be wrong. I hope he's all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0015
rows.name:
You know Enrai over in the industrial district?
You'd never guess it, but he's got an insatiable
sweet tooth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0016
rows.name:
He always used to sit alone at the bake shop,
but I think something's changed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0017
rows.name:
The other day, he brought his whole team for cake.
Can you believe it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0018
rows.name:
They sat there for a good 30 minutes sipping at their
tea and talking about work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026901_MSG0019
rows.name:
It was so nice to see him with friends.
I felt as proud as if I was his own mother![ST:wait ]
